subject: Create and run tests for Phase 2-3 code node implementations
description:
Created 6 test files for Phase 2-3 code nodes. All 294 tests pass across 13 files.

Evidence:
- `tests/code-nodes/website-rag-crawler/url-discovery/url-discovery.test.ts:1` - 21 tests for `parseSitemapXml`, `generateDefaultUrls`, `processTavilyMapResponse`, `discoverUrls`
- `tests/code-nodes/website-rag-crawler/tier-tavily-crawl/tier-tavily-crawl.test.ts:1` - 14 tests for `transformTavilyResponse`, `buildTavilyCrawlParams`
- `tests/code-nodes/website-rag-crawler/tier-firecrawl-crawl/tier-firecrawl-crawl.test.ts:1` - 19 tests for `transformFirecrawlResponse`, `buildFirecrawlCrawlBody`, `shouldSkipFirecrawl`
- `tests/code-nodes/website-rag-crawler/tier-jina-reader/tier-jina-reader.test.ts:1` - 20 tests for `buildJinaUrl`, `extractMarkdownTitle`, `transformJinaResponse`, `assembleJinaResult`
- `tests/code-nodes/website-rag-crawler/tier-http-basic/tier-http-basic.test.ts:1` - 29 tests for `stripHtmlToText`, `assembleHttpResult`
- `tests/code-nodes/website-rag-crawler/pick-best-primary/pick-best-primary.test.ts:1` - 20 tests for `pickBestPrimary`, `evaluateTierResult`

Verification: `bunx vitest run tests/code-nodes/website-rag-crawler/` => 13 passed, 294 tests passed, 4 skipped
